passed_checks.check_name: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation
code_block:
kind: Deployment
apiVersion: apps/v1
metadata:
  name: shopdeploy
  namespace: shoping-app
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: shop
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: shop
      name: shoppod
    spec:
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1001
        fsGroup: 1001
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      automountServiceAccountToken: false

      containers:
        - name: user
          image: anubhav730/app1@sha256:d44e51e723b95299ae2e8613aa03ed055a12c87a8895f3ecc1def2a35d40284c
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
            - containerPort: 1234
          securityContext:
            capabilities:
              drop:
                - ALL
            runAsUser: 1000
            runAsGroup: 1000
            fsGroup: 1000
            allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
            readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          resources:
            requests:
              cpu: "100m"
              memory: "128Mi"
            limits:
              cpu: "200m"
              memory: "256Mi"
          livenessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /health
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
